glsa.title: libssh: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in libssh could lead to a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: libssh is a multiplatform C library implementing the SSHv2 protocol on client and server side.

description.p: libssh was found to have a NULL pointer dereference in tftpserver.c if the function ssh_buffer_new returns NULL.

impact.p: An attacker could cause a possible Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libssh users should upgrade to the latest version:
